name: fuckyoufriday
text: I wonder if this was a subconscious reference to Mr. Show's "Wicked Sceptre" sketch.

name: fishingblues
text: Onstad himself in an interview said that Mr. Show is like an apogee of comedy so I'm sure that this was a 'wicked' (see what I did there?) send up of the magic of Bob and David.

name: twotonturkey
text: I understood what you did there.

name: djwhiterabbit
text:
heh, you beat me to the remark - i just rewatched the way too hilarious "wyckyd sceptre" episode of mr. show and had the same revelation. and i see from the comment below that chris onstad has confirmed his appreciation of the show...

excellent!

name: chaesar
text: If you write a comedy skit you're gonna have some rat feces in there.

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I'd like to point out that Ray refers to "back in his party days". Why should we think these AREN'T Ray's party days? I mean...two arcs of this strip are ray throwing/attending parties. All he does is leisure.

name: featurelessvoid
text: Now that he charges all parties to his record label, his leisure is considered business.  It's a tax thing.

name: shoinan
text: If Ray doesn't think these days are his party days, his party days must've been dayum good.

name: connormc
text: Sometimes he'd come home with Dolphin burns over 80% of his chest.

name: achewoodno1fan
text: A comment left by achewoodno1fan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by katsura, RogerGS, petro, charchar)

name: steerpike66
text: Little Nephew's face in the second to last frame is a study in quaking revulsion.

name: cailetshadow
text: I think that's the face Bambi made when his mother got shot by Man.

name: berami
text: Haha, sheer terror, followed by "is he serious ?

name: songbirdspectre
text: little nephew all holding his arm like he always does...

name: estutius
text: Oh come on, Ray. At least it's not Darkthrone.

name: sargasm
text: AND THE DEMONS AND THE ELVES DID REVEL IN THE THROES OF THE MADNESS OF THE MOUNTAIN KING AND WERE LIKE "BONE, BONE, BONE..."

name: rowboat
text: Presumably something along the lines of this:

name: molesticide
text: is that what would happen if spinal tap tried even harder?

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Merciful god what horrors have you posted here?

name: charchar
text: A: hawtness (holy leptons, did i just say 'hawtness?' inside voice: you suuuuure did, there.)

name: achilleselbow
text: It makes me sad that no one was able to correctly identify this. Truly they are the Kings of Metal.

name: goro
text:
Are those the guys from Manowar?

It's gotta be Manowar, they are the gayest. Which doesn't mean they can't rock.

I wonder if Hyddyn Sceptyre is straight up Blind Guardian type shit. I could see myself getting mad rutty with some extremely hippie chick to that music.

name: rowboat
text: Yes. Manowar. But don't be fooled - the dudes are as straight as the day is long.

name: tekende
text: Well, I'm just gonna sit here thinkin' they're gay and you'll be wrong.

name: zapatos
text: If it is winter, they are as straight as usual.

name: dracer2
text: Whenever a girl will let me (not often), I put on Hail and Kill during love making. It gets the sweat hell runnin' down my back. Oh yes.

name: rowboat
text: As a man speaking as a lady, I would never fuck you to Manowar.

name: zapatos
text: I like to put on my ElectricSix fuck-mix.

name: daedala_x
text:
if i wanted to get it on, as soon as you started playing manowar i would just be all oh dang what was i thinking i don't want to be in this crummy room trading touches with a gross fellow, i want to be part of that HALL .

unless you were playing pleasure slave, that would be cool.

it's kind of unhealthy just how much i love manowar. if i ever have a wedding, we will play brothers of metal as i walk down the aisle, each row all stands up and throws a fist in the air as i pass, tears are streaming down my face i am so happy.

name: tekende
text: Chubbied for "trading touches."

name: zapatos
text: You will be the most beautiful bride there ever was, they will throw their fist into the air as Legion.

name: dracer2
text: But what are you going to play for the sweet waltz with your father?

name: ricnine
text: The last three panels are.. just so awesome it makes me tear up a bit.

name: soticoto
text: Ray is so damned evil sometimes it burns my toe-hairs.

name: mindbnder
text: if all parents described sex to their children in this fashion, the human race would disappear in a generation.

name: mattylite
text: Ray referring to himself as "old Uncle Ray" to get all up in LN's mind and really paint the picture there is the sort of subtlety that makes one want to leave a comment about it.

name: tagrineth
text: A comment left by tagrineth was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Clare, robofunk, Boredom_Man)

name: pjwentz
text: Now I know how to make anyone not like a band.

name: stereo
text: I used to play with my hashpipe to the sweet sound of Weezer, if you know what I mean - And I think you do.

name: tekende
text: I used to Floyd my Pink to The Wall if you know what I mean.

name: stereo
text: I Beethoven use a kleenex afterward. If you know what I'm saying.

name: rowboat
text: At this very moment I am praising my Madonna to a little "Ave Maria," if you dig.

name: desert_donkey
text: "party days".
